welcome: Welcome to ImInstant Command Line Interface
new_version_available: A new version of ImInstant is available
using_latest_version: You are using the latest version of ImInstant
failed_check_updates: Failed to check for updates. Server returned status code
set_computer_name_description: Sets the computer name to the specified name.
error_specify_computer_name: Error: Please specify the new computer name.
attempting_set_computer_name: Attempting to set computer name to
failed_set_computer_name: Failed to set computer name. Please check your permissions.
error_specify_setting_value: Error: Please specify a setting and a value.
failed_set_setting: Failed to set setting. Please check your permissions and the value provided.
description_powercfg_sleep: Sets the sleep timeout for AC power.
description_powercfg_hibernate: Sets the hibernate timeout for AC power.
description_powercfg_display: Sets the display timeout for AC power.
